translation: Zero!{#Name="Four"}
source: Zero!{#Name="Four"}

translation: ...Four.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Four.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, sweet Zero...{#Name="Four"}
source: Oh, sweet Zero...{#Name="Four"}

translation: I've realized something.{#Name="Four"}
source: I've realized something.{#Name="Four"}

translation: We don't have to be scared of this world.{#Name="Four"}
source: We don't have to be scared of this world.{#Name="Four"}

translation: Because once I destroy it...there won't be a world to be scared of anymore!{#Name="Four"}
source: Because once I destroy it...there won't be a world to be scared of anymore!{#Name="Four"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Four"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Four"}

translation: The flower's taken her over.{#Name="Zero"}
source: The flower's taken her over.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: This entire world will sing for me!{#Name="Four"}
source: This entire world will sing for me!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Zophiel, come to me!{#Name="Four"}
source: Zophiel, come to me!{#Name="Four"}

translation: A dragon!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: A dragon!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's... That's Lady One's...{#Name="Octa"}
source: That's... That's Lady One's...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: No, it's different.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No, it's different.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: How did Four manage to summon a daemon dragon!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: How did Four manage to summon a daemon dragon!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Intoners can't normally do that?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Intoners can't normally do that?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No. Not without losing their minds, they can't.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No. Not without losing their minds, they can't.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: One was the only sister with{LF}the power to pull it off.{#Name="Zero"}
source: One was the only sister with{LF}the power to pull it off.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But you can call me, Zero! And you're okay!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But you can call me, Zero! And you're okay!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Or maybe you were already bonkers from the start?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Or maybe you were already bonkers from the start?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Right...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Right...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No, dummy!{#Name="Zero"}
source: No, dummy!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You're not a daemon.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're not a daemon.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Plus, I'm...special, okay? I'm different.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Plus, I'm...special, okay? I'm different.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Fie, my sister! Fie on you!{#Name="Four"}
source: Fie, my sister! Fie on you!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Look at you, murdering your{LF}kin to claim their powers!{#Name="Four"}
source: Look at you, murdering your{LF}kin to claim their powers!{#Name="Four"}

translation: I don't want your power, Sis.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I don't want your power, Sis.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But I will kill you. All of you.{LF}...Sorry about that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: But I will kill you. All of you.{LF}...Sorry about that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You aren't sorry. Oh, you aren't sorry at all.{#Name="Four"}
source: You aren't sorry. Oh, you aren't sorry at all.{#Name="Four"}

translation: Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha! You want to kill ME?{#Name="Four"}
source: Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha! You want to kill ME?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Ah ha! Hee hee hee hee ha ha ha!{#Name="Four"}
source: Ah ha! Hee hee hee hee ha ha ha!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Do you remember, Zero? Do you remember{LF}how I used to imitate you all the time?{#Name="Four"}
source: Do you remember, Zero? Do you remember{LF}how I used to imitate you all the time?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Your clothes, your hair, your makeup...{LF}Everything! Hee hee!{#Name="Four"}
source: Your clothes, your hair, your makeup...{LF}Everything! Hee hee!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Not at all. In fact, I'm pretty sure{LF}that never actually happened.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Not at all. In fact, I'm pretty sure{LF}that never actually happened.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So now I'm going to imitate you again!{#Name="Four"}
source: So now I'm going to imitate you again!{#Name="Four"}

translation: If you're going to be an Intoner killer...{LF}then I'm going to be an Intoner killer too!{#Name="Four"}
source: If you're going to be an Intoner killer...{LF}then I'm going to be an Intoner killer too!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Then the world will finally be quiet.{#Name="Four"}
source: Then the world will finally be quiet.{#Name="Four"}

translation: Shhh... Not a peep from you, world. Eee hee hee!{#Name="Four"}
source: Shhh... Not a peep from you, world. Eee hee hee!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Imagine, Zero... You and I in a silent world.{LF}A world where we can play hide-and-seek!{#Name="Four"}
source: Imagine, Zero... You and I in a silent world.{LF}A world where we can play hide-and-seek!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Are you hiding yet, Zero? Are you?{#Name="Four"}
source: Are you hiding yet, Zero? Are you?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Because ready or not...here I coooooome!{#Name="Four"}
source: Because ready or not...here I coooooome!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Zerooo! Zerooo?{#Name="Four"}
source: Zerooo! Zerooo?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Zeeerooooooooo!{#Name="Four"}
source: Zeeerooooooooo!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Where aaaaaare yoooooou, my siiiiiister!?{#Name="Four"}
source: Where aaaaaare yoooooou, my siiiiiister!?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Zeeerooooooooo!{#Name="Four"}
source: Zeeerooooooooo!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Eee hee hee hee ha ha ha ha haaaaaa!{#Name="Four"}
source: Eee hee hee hee ha ha ha ha haaaaaa!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Ready for the next game? Okay!{LF}Simon saaays...fight!{#Name="Four"}
source: Ready for the next game? Okay!{LF}Simon saaays...fight!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Simon saaays...rip your guts out! Come on, do it!{#Name="Four"}
source: Simon saaays...rip your guts out! Come on, do it!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Now, try and take me on!{LF}...Ha! I didn't say Simon says!{#Name="Four"}
source: Now, try and take me on!{LF}...Ha! I didn't say Simon says!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Get her! Tear her apart!{LF}TEEEEEEAR HER APAAART!{#Name="Four"}
source: Get her! Tear her apart!{LF}TEEEEEEAR HER APAAART!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Don't listen to her, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Don't listen to her, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: She's bonkers! She'll make you bonkers too!{LF}Totally bonkers!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: She's bonkers! She'll make you bonkers too!{LF}Totally bonkers!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Stop saying bonkers already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stop saying bonkers already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No... Please, no!{#Name="Four"}
source: No... Please, no!{#Name="Four"}

translation: B-But...how could...{#Name="Four"}
source: B-But...how could...{#Name="Four"}

translation: this happen...to...me...{#Name="Four"}
source: this happen...to...me...{#Name="Four"}

translation: Don't worry.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't worry.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Your sisters will be joining you soon enough.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Your sisters will be joining you soon enough.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey. She's all yours.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey. She's all yours.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The evolution of a dragon...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: The evolution of a dragon...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Good gracious! He's evolved twice in one go!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Good gracious! He's evolved twice in one go!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Everything is ready now. ...Michael.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Everything is ready now. ...Michael.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Kill Four.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Kill Four.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Leave this to me!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Leave this to me!{#Name="Zero"}
